aiAutonomy.thankYouTitle: Thank you for sharing with us.
aiAutonomy.verseBody: The verse "Whoever saves a single life in Israel" emphasizes the immense value of human life in Judaism. It teaches us that saving lives is an important commandment, and that every action taken to save a life is considered great. In this way, the verse reinforces our commitment to care for one another and to act for the common good.

commander.subtitle: Military Dilemma
commander.description: You are a commander in Unit 8200. The Prophet system predicts a mass disaster in 48 hours. AI simulations show that if you publish a warning, panic will kill more people than the disaster itself.
commander.reflectionText: Point to consider: Do you listen to the machine's mathematics which saves lives, or act according to human morality which demands truth?
